item.title: When it comes to worldwide religious tolerance, DMT could be the answer
item.description:
When it comes to worldwide religious tolerance, DMT could be the answer

Despite its role in bringing forth peace, purpose, prosperity and confluence within societies and the individual, religion is simultaneously noted as one of the world's most persistent dividing and conflicting forces. Now, why is that?

item.title: Demystifying Ayahuasca: An Expert Guide Through the Ritual
item.description:
Demystifying Ayahuasca: An Expert Guide Through the Ritual

Over the last decade, the Amazonian hallucinogenic brew ayahuasca has swept through the West, becoming famous for affecting powerful (and often lasting) change in people who take it. Eager Western seekers have descended on the Amazon and the high jungle of the Andes, flooding towns like Iquitos and Pucallpa with both ayahuasca tourists and shamans who serve them - along with scam artists and shady practices.

item.title: In The Amazon, Scientists Seek A Cure For Autoimmune Disease
item.description:
In The Amazon, Scientists Seek A Cure For Autoimmune Disease

Ten years ago, Mark Pischea, then a 42-year-old political consultant and father of five from Williamston, Michigan, was rushed to the hospital with severe stomach pain. Pischea was diagnosed with Crohn's disease, a chronic autoimmune condition that can cause extreme abdominal discomfort, weight loss, fatigue and fevers.

item.title: 11 Best Photos Of The 16th Annual 'Día De Los Muertos' Festival In Los Angeles
item.description:
11 Best Photos Of The 16th Annual 'Día De Los Muertos' Festival In Los Angeles

Top 35 Latin American Alternative Albums Of All Time; Listen To The Best Songs [PHOTOS] Yuzzy Acosta, Mariluz González, Ernesto Sánchez, and Remezcla choose 35 essential modern albums to listen to in this life.

item.title: Meet Richael Faithful, a Queer Black 'Street Shaman'
item.description:
Meet Richael Faithful, a Queer Black 'Street Shaman'

Richael Faithful is a 30-year-old black queer street shaman, folk healer and lawyer living in Washington, D.C. Even in the corner of the noisy downtown café where Faithful and I met for our interview, her quiet presence drowned out much of the early lunchtime background noise.

item.title: Find out what is behind Ayahuasca that natives call sacred
item.description:
Find out what is behind Ayahuasca that natives call sacred

Colombia is one of the region's fastest growing tourist destinations. In 2014, more than four million foreigners enjoyed its diverse landscapes, its colonial cities, beach sites section of the Amazon rain forest and more.

item.title: Demystifying The Dietary Recommendations Prior To An Ayahuasca Ceremony - Reset.me
item.description:
Demystifying The Dietary Recommendations Prior To An Ayahuasca Ceremony - Reset.me

You've felt the call and have decided that working with ayahuasca will be an invaluable tool for your spiritual growth and development. One of the key considerations that factors directly into the fabric of an ayahuasca experience is dietary preparation. Reset contributor Dale Richardson, Ph.D.

item.title: Do Entities From Another Universe Inhabit the Brains of Psychedelic DMT Users?
item.description:
Do Entities From Another Universe Inhabit the Brains of Psychedelic DMT Users?

Have you encountered stick men, machine elves or other discarnate entities while tripping brains on DMT? If so, you're not alone. The use of the powerful, fast-acting psychedelic dimethyltriptamine (DMT) generates reports of such entities on a regular basis.

item.title: Amazon leaders and academics denounce ayahuasca rituals led by outsiders
item.description:
Amazon leaders and academics denounce ayahuasca rituals led by outsiders

BOGOTÁ, Colombia - Among indigenous peoples from the upper Amazon in South America, views on outsiders participating in rituals involving ayahuasca - the medicinal plant and the hallucinogenic drink made from it - vary. But even those who are more welcoming believe some ayahuasca tourists diverge too far from tradition, putting themselves and others at risk.

item.title: Shocking statement made by two renowned scientists: death does not exist
item.description:
Shocking statement made by two renowned scientists: death does not exist

What happens after we die? Is death the end of everything or is there any life after death? I think many of us have been curious about this at least once in our lifetime. Two researchers specialized in quantum physics state that they can prove the existence of life after death and the soul.
